creditline: Gift of George and Marilyn Johnson in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: dark red-brown wooden brush with carved handle with three segments along its shaft; segment at tip of the handle shows a boar, rat, goat, rooster and ox; middle segment shows a dog, rabbit, tiger, horse and monkey; top section (nearest bristles) shows a dragon and snake; top of handle housing the bristles is rounded and bulb-like with adjoining ring; blonde-colored hair bristles
title: Calligraphy brush
